legal_basis: Administrative law requires impartiality and independence in tribunal decisions.
decision_reasoning: A reasonable apprehension of bias arises if a well-informed, right-minded observer perceives bias.
The member arrived at the hearing with a draft decision, which appeared final. Despite claims it was only notes, this raised concerns about impartiality.
procedure_followed: Judicial review application based on allegations of bias; Federal Court reviewed the Refugee Protection Divisionâ€™s decision.
result_of_case: Court allowed the judicial review, invalidated the original decision, and ordered a new hearing with a different member.
